name: datakit
description: Simple JavaScript/TypeScript library for reading and writing CSV and JSON data files.

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean-build:watch: npm run clean-build && npm run build:watch
scripts.test:watch: mocha --watch --watch-files src/test/**/*.test.ts --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --full-trace --recursive --exclude src/test/pipelines.test.ts src/test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run test-pipelines && npm run build && npm run create-cli-docs
scripts.test-1: ts-node ./src/cli/from-yaml < .\src\test\data\example-data.yaml | ts-node ./src/cli/transform "records => records.map(r => ({ ...r, CashPool: Math.floor(r.CashPool) }))" | ts-node ./src/cli/to-yaml
scripts.test-3: ts-node ./src/cli/from-yaml < .\src\test\data\example-data.yaml | ts-node ./src/cli/transform "records => records.map(r => ({ ...r, CashPool: Math.floor(r.CashPool) }))" | ts-node ./src/cli/length
scripts.test-7: ts-node ./src/cli/from-csv < .\src\test\data\example-data.csv | ts-node ./src/cli/transform "records => records.map(r => ({ ...r, CashPool: Math.floor(r.CashPool) }))" | ts-node ./src/cli/to-csv
scripts.test-9: cat ./src/test/data/starwars/characters.json | ts-node ./src/cli/map "r => ({ name: r.name, gender: r.gender, homeworld: r.homeworld })" | ts-node ./src/cli/sort "r => r.gender" --direction=ascending "r => r.name" --direction=ascending |  ts-node ./src/cli/to-csv
scripts.test-13: ts-node ./src/cli/map "r => ({ ...r, name: r.homeworld === 'Tatooine' ? chalk.green(r.name) : r.name })" < ./src/test/data/starwars/characters.json | ts-node ./src/cli/format-table
scripts.test-15: ts-node ./src/cli/intersect "character => character.homeworld" ./src/test/data/starwars/characters.json "planet => planet.name" ./src/test/data/starwars/planets.json "(character, planet) => ({ character, planet })"
scripts.test-16: ts-node ./src/cli/intersect "character => character.homeworld" ./src/test/data/starwars/characters.json "planet => planet.name" ./src/test/data/starwars/planets.json "(character, planet) => character ? (planet ? ({ ...planet, ...character}) : character) : undefined"
scripts.test-18: ts-node ./src/cli/group "r => r.homeworld" < ./src/test/data/starwars/characters.json | ts-node ./src/cli/reduce "(o, r) => { o[r.key] = r. records; return o; }" "{}"

author: ashley@codecapers.com.au
